name: Telecoast Communications
overview: Telecoast Communications, LLC distributes and sells new, recertified, and pre-owned networking hardware products. It offers optical networking products, routers, switches, universal gateways and access servers, cable modem termination systems, content networking products, application-oriented networking products, storage networking products, IP telephony products, and wireless products; and accessories, including transceivers, memory, and cables. The company also provides security products, which include router traffic anomaly detector and router anomaly guard modules, series adaptive security appliances, security appliances, firewall services modules, secure access control server solution engines, intrusion prevention systems, sensors, IDS services module-2, hardware clients, adaptive security appliances, security appliances, concentrators, WebVPN services modules, and IPSec VPN shared port adapters. In addition, it offers asset recovery programs, such as on-site assessment and de-installation, packing and logistics, and transportation and warehousing services; and an exchange program for service providers, enterprise corporations, and research/testing facilities. The company was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Santa Barbara, California.
